events.message: The applicant submitted a personal loan request to cover upcoming medical expenses and related costs.
The loan application was reviewed and categorised under personal loans due to the stated medical reason.
A loan officer specializing in personal loans was assigned to assist with the applicant's file.
The initial review assessed the applicant’s credit history and financial situation relating to medical costs.
Additional documents including medical bills and proof of income were requested to proceed with verification.
The applicant promptly submitted all requested medical invoices and income statements as per guidelines.
Credit check results were received, showing a stable credit score with no recent delinquencies.
Risk assessment was conducted based on financials and credit report, identifying moderate risk due to recent medical debts.
A personal loan offer including repayment terms and interest rates was presented to the applicant.
The applicant expressed agreement with the offer and confirmed willingness to proceed with the loan terms.
Based on provided documentation and positive feedback, the loan was officially approved by underwriting.
Funds were disbursed to the applicant's bank account to assist with the urgent medical expenses.
Loan officer conducted a follow-up call to confirm the funds were received and the applicant’s satisfaction.
The loan case was closed following successful disbursement and initial positive feedback from the applicant.
